echo:SwayingBeam.NAME: Swaying Beam
echo:SwayingBeam.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL echo:Focused: deal !D! damage.

echo:TriShot.NAME: Tri-Shot
echo:TriShot.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Draw !echo:M2! card{!echo:M2!|>1=s|@=}. NL Exhaust.

echo:EchoDash.NAME: Echo Dash
echo:EchoDash.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! echo:Flight. NL You can no longer gain echo:Flight in this combat. NL Exhaust.

echo:SatisfyingStick.NAME: Satisfying Stick
echo:SatisfyingStick.DESCRIPTION: If the target has echo:Sticky_Bombs, apply !M! echo:Sticky_Bombs.

echo:FinalBlow.NAME: Final Blow
echo:FinalBlow.DESCRIPTION: When an enemy dies, gain !M! echo:Ultimate_Charge.

echo:MayhemForm.NAME: Mayhem Form
echo:MayhemForm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the end of your turn, gain !M! echo:Flight, !echo:M2! echo:Ultimate_Charge and apply !M! {!M!|>1=echo:Sticky_Bombs|@=echo:Sticky_Bomb} to ALL enemies.

echo:FlexibleCopy.NAME: Flexible Copy
echo:FlexibleCopy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}echo:Charged: echo:duplicate a character. NL Otherwise, draw !M! card{!M!|>1=s|@=}.
